alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 1:54AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cass County through 230 AM CDT... At 154 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported a strong thunderstorm over Embden, or 28 miles east of Valley City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chaffee around 205 AM CDT. Leonard around 230 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 94 in North Dakota near mile marker 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
